Description: Sherd of shoulder of Chian pottery transport amphora; cream slip; micaceous light brown clay; red-brown fired diagonal band; incised inscription.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 411)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Johnston 2006b / The Delta: From Gamma to Zeta (p.28 Table 1)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JA.017)
